title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: When I launch the Help view, I need to first click on one of the "live" areas (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before the tab key starts working.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
EB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key should allow me to navigate through the different elements on the page.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Launch the Help view. 2. Try using the tab key without clicking on any "live" areas. 3. Observe that the tab key does not respond. 4. Click on one of the "live" areas and try using the tab key again. 5. Observe that the tab key now works as expected.
